page.title: 03The Sands Centre Carlisle(ii
page.content: The Centre stands on the site of a former cattle market, now used as a car park, and is on a bus route. The restaurant overlooks the River Eden; there is a patio for summer barbecues. Canoeists use the white water of the river. Up to 40 people are employed as instructors and office staff.They oversee activities such as{(adult {charges in brackets)}Badminton (Â£2.50 per hr); Squash (Â£2.30 per 45 mins); Climbing Wall (80p per session);Table Tennis (Â£1.25 per hr); Sauna and Jacuzzi (Â£1.75 per session); Sunbed with stereo cassette (Â£1.50 per 30 mins); Fitness Rooms (Â£1.00 per session).Equipment can be hired such as squash racquets (40p) and roller skates (40p). The Centre is open seven days a week from 10 a.m.(9 a.m. Sat/Sun) until 11 p.m.
